answerText: The Master of Hestviken (or Olav Audunssøn i Hestviken)[10] The Master of Hestviken is a work by this Nobel Prize-winning author of Kristin Lavransdatter.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Harvard A, UVA B | 13 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this tetralogy centering on Olav and Ingunn, set largely on the title estate in the 13th and 14th centuries. Its volumes include The Axe and The Snake Pit.
